name: Windsor Management Group
overview: Windsor Management Group LLC develops K-12 business software solutions for school districts in the United States. The company offers Infinite Visions Enterprise Edition, an integrated suite of financial, human resources (HR), payroll, state reporting, accounts payable, accounts receivable, warehouse, fixed assets, purchasing, and grants and project tracking modules. Its products comprise Financial Suite, a multi-fund and modified accrual accounting system that allows automatic data entry from accounts to the general ledger with adjustment through journal entries; Human Resources Suite, which enables to manage personnel and payroll processes; and iVisions Web Portal, an integrated online component of Infinite Visions, which provides access to financial and HR data for employees. The companyâ€™s products also include State Reporting that provides mandatory electronic and hard-copy reporting; Supported Interfaces; and Electronic Payments solution, an online electronic payment service, which allows schools and districts to accept payment for any type of school activity. In addition, it provides implementation planning and project management, process improvement consulting, training, installation, data import, and software and technical support services. The company was founded in 1980 and is based in Tempe, Arizona.

acquisition.source_description: Tyler Technologies Acquires Windsor Management Group, Expands Share of K-12 Education Market Nationwide
